Class AdminAttractionPageController

java.lang.Object
Controller.AdminAttractionPageController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AdminAttractionPageController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller de la page d'administration des attractions. Permet de gérer les attractions (ajout, modification, suppression).
